room_title: Escape room "Sirens Song" by Suite Escape in Amarillo
room_description: What was meant to be a relaxing day on the ocean quickly turns into something else when a mysterious fog begins to roll in. You look up to find a towering pirate ship floating next to your yacht. Unable to resist the temptation, you and your friends board the massive ghost ship to see where it came from. The Sirens Song has its hold, and it is up to you and your crew to find a way out before it disappears again.
